text: 26:15 Sekaraia 11:12; Matyu 27:3Egha a kamaghɨn men azai, “Kɨ Iesus isɨva ian dafaribar atɨghtɨ, ia tizim na danɨngam?” Ezɨ me 30plan silvan dagɨar maba mengegha, da isa a ganɨngi.26:15 Dagɨar 30 silvan kaba ti datɨrɨghɨn en dagɨabar dɨbobonim, ti manmakɨn? Da avɨraseme, egha gumazim iakɨnir 5pla o 6plan ingarizir ivezimɨn mɨn otogham. Nɨ Matyu 27:9-10ɨn gan.
